description: The Straw Hat Pirates are the main protagonists of One Piece, led by Monkey D. Luffy. This episode shows all the crew members separated across different islands after being scattered by Bartholomew Kuma.

keyMoments.title: All Crew Members Think of Their Captain
keyMoments.description: Despite being scattered across the world in different locations, all Straw Hat crew members are united in their concern for Luffy upon learning about Ace's death.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the deep bonds that tie the crew together regardless of physical distance.

description: The Revolutionary Army is an organization led by Monkey D. Dragon that seeks to overthrow the World Government. They freed the slaves at Tequila Wolf and invited Robin to join them.

keyMoments.title: Revolutionary Army Meets Robin
keyMoments.description: Revolutionary Army members speak with Nico Robin at Tequila Wolf, revealing they have been searching for her for ten years due to her Ohara heritage. They call her the 'Light of the Revolution.'
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the Revolutionary Army's interest in Robin and their respect for her connection to Ohara.

keyMoments.title: Revolutionary Army Respects Robin's Choice
keyMoments.description: When Robin declines their invitation to join them, the Revolutionary Army respects her decision and allows her to return to the Straw Hats.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the Revolutionary Army's principles and their respect for individual choice, unlike the World Government.
